com.paydiant.android.ui.service.applicationinfo

Interface IApplicationInfoRetrievalListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationInfoRetrievalListenerAdapter

    public interface IApplicationInfoRetrievalListener
    The listener interface for receiving IApplicationInfoRetrievalService operation callbacks. In order to register for callback events, an instance of this would needed to be set through the IApplicationInfoRetrievalService.setApplicationInfoRetrievalListener(IApplicationInfoRetrievalListener) method. This must be set before invoking any of the service operations.

    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    ApplicationInfoRetrievalListenerAdapter
